tool_description: Fast and affordable anti fraud tools with real-time fraud scoring to identify high risk users & transactions
name: IPRisk
title: IPRisk

api_list.name: GetIpInfo
api_list.description: This method will return as much information as the IP as we can. Including Proxy Information, VPN, TOR Exit Node, etc!

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: Format can be XML or JSON, JSON has been selected as default

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: Provide IP (IPV4), We will return as much information on it as we can!

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://iprisk1.p.rapidapi.com/getipinfo/json/8.8.8.8/96d2bec0111ae7fd557083b6e5f7be27"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "iprisk1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://iprisk1.p.rapidapi.com/getipinfo/{format}/{ip}/96d2bec0111ae7fd557083b6e5f7be27"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "iprisk1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: BIN and IIN Verification
api_list.description: This method will return Bank Identification Number (BIN), IIN and Credit Card Information.

required_parameters.name: BIN
required_parameters.description: First 8 Digits of Credit Card or Debit Card or all Digits of Credit card or Debit Card

required_parameters.name: FORMAT
required_parameters.description: Value can be JSON or XML

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://iprisk1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/BINVerify/json/346596/96d2bec0111ae7fd557083b6e5f7be27"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "iprisk1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://iprisk1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/BINVerify/{format}/{bin}/96d2bec0111ae7fd557083b6e5f7be27"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "iprisk1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
